hibernate-mapping.sql-query: insert into EO_ORDER_CONTAINER (EOOC_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, ORG_ID, PM_CODE, EOOC_ORDER_NO, EOOC_CONTAINER_TYPE_CODE, EOOC_CONTAINER_TYPE_NAME, EOOC_QUANTITY, EOOC_REMARK) select SEQ_EO_ORDER_CONTAINER.NEXTVAL, EOOR.CREATOR, SYSDATE, EOOR.MODIFIER, SYSDATE, 0, 0, EOOR.ORG_ID, SYS_GUID(), :eoorOrderLinkNo, EOOC.EOOC_CONTAINER_TYPE_CODE, EOOC.EOOC_CONTAINER_TYPE_NAME, EOOC.EOOC_QUANTITY, EOOC.EOOC_REMARK from EO_ORDER_CONTAINER EOOC left join EO_ORDER EOOR on EOOR.EOOR_ORDER_NO = EOOC.EOOC_ORDER_NO and EOOR.ORG_ID = EOOC.ORG_ID where EOOC.EOOC_ORDER_NO in (:eoorOrderNos) and EOOC.ORG_ID = :orgId
